name: Iron Man Game
desc: The project I worked on during my internship at EA Motive. I worked on gameplay programming and some UI in Frostbite Engine and Unreal Engine 5.

name: Imminent
desc: A roguelike deck-building game in Unity. Won two nominations in the 2022 Ubisoft Game Lab Competition.

name: Space Rides
desc: A space combat game using that takes inspiration from Star Wars: Squadrons and Kirby Air Ride. Made in Unity.

name: Warzone Game
desc: A Risk-style game made in C++ and STL.
